name: Snap_Shots
display_help: You fire both plasma pistols at once at a single target. Firing both pistols at once is slower than a single shot, but deals more damage, and the target may get knocked down by the force of the impact. The target also suffers reduced regeneration.
display_target_help: Your regeneration has been reduced and you are unable to fly.

name: Aimed_Shot
display_help: You quickly fire a round from one of your plasma pistols. Your target suffers lethal and energy damage, as well as a reduction in their regeneration.
display_target_help: Your regeneration has been reduced and you are unable to fly.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

name: Overcharged_Shots
display_help: You fire an overcharged round from one of your plasma pistols. This causes a burst of energy to be released on impact that can affect several targets, who suffer lethal and energy damage, as well as a reduction in their regeneration. Affected targets will also be set on fire.
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), High DMG (Lethal/Energy), Minor DoT (Fire), -Regen (Foe), -Fly (Foe)
display_target_help: You are suffering fire damage over time and your regeneration has been reduced. You are also unable to fly.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

name: Fusillade
display_help: You quickly fire several shots from your plasma pistols. These can hit multiple targets, causing lethal and energy damage. Affected targets also suffer a reduction in their regeneration.
display_target_help: Your regeneration has been reduced and you are unable to fly.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

name: Minelayer
display_help: You begin dropping proximity mines around the battlefield.

name: Crusader_Fury
display_help: You are driven by an unrelenting fury. It boosts your awareness significantly, improving your chance to hit and perception. Additionally, you are acutely aware of the conditions on the battlefield, enabling you to better defend yourself and attack your foes, manifesting as increased defense and damage potential.

name: Focused_Shot
display_help: You quickly fire a round from one of your pistols, causing lethal damage to a single target. If the target is also a designated target, additional lethal damage is done.
display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

name: Dual_Strike
display_help: You fire a round from each of your pistols. These cause lethal damage and leave wounds that cause lethal damage over time. Additionally, the target's defenses are reduced and there is a chance the target may be knocked down. If the target is also a designated target, additional lethal damage is done.
display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Minor DoT (Lethal), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown (Foe), Special
display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time and your defenses have been reduced.

name: Barrage
display_help: You fire a barrage of bullets in a cone in front of you. Affected targets suffer lethal damage with each bullet that hits them. Targets also suffer a reduced chance to hit and may be knocked down. If the target is also a designated target, additional lethal damage is done.
display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), High DoT (Lethal), -ToHit (Foe), Chance for Knockdown (Foe), Special
display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time and your chance to hit has been reduced.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

name: Storm_of_Bullets
display_help: You fire numerous bullets at your target so fast that the eye cannot keep up. This causes a warped bullet trajectory, which causes lethal damage with each hit, as well as an additional chance to knock the target back. The lingering effects of the storm reduce the target's attack speed. If the target is also a designated target, additional lethal damage is done.
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), High DoT (Lethal), Knockback (Foe), -DMG(Foe, All)
display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time and your attack speed has been reduced.

name: Disrupting_Shot
display_help: You take aim and fire a single, powerful round at your target, piercing through any defenses they may have. The target suffers lethal damage from the initial shot, then additional lethal damage from their wound. The target is also exhausted, suffering reduced resistance to damage, regeneration and recovery. If the target is also a designated target, additional lethal damage is done.
display_short_help: Ranged (Narrow Cone), High DMG (Lethal), Minor DoT(Lethal/Toxic), -DMG(Foe, All), -RES(Foe, All), Special
display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time. Additionally, your damage potential, regeneration and recovery have been reduced.

name: Staggering_Shot
display_help: You fire a well aimed round at your target. This round strikes the target in a vulnerable spot, causing lethal damage and staggering them. The affected target is stunned and suffers reduced damage, defense, healing and chance to hit. If the target is also a designated target, additional lethal damage is done.
display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG (Lethal), -DMG (Foe, All), -DEF (Foe, All), -ToHit (Foe), +RES (Foe, Heal), Stun (Foe), Special
display_target_help: You have been stunned. Additionally, your damage, defense, healing and chance to hit have been reduced.

name: Targeting_Data_Acquired
display_help: You update the targeting information available to all nearby allies, improving their chance to hit. Attack speed is also increased, as the more accurate information means your allies spend less time needing to prepare their attacks. Though targeting information is updated every 30 seconds, the most current update is only accurate for a portion of the time between updates, so this bonus will fall off before the next update can occur.

name: Target_Designator
display_help: You paint a single target with a designator mark that allows you to do more damage against it. Setting a target is interruptible.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} paints you with a {PowerName}, enabling its attacks to be more effective against you.

name: Place_Proximity_Mine
display_help: Grant

name: Resistance
display_help: The Explosive Trap is fragile, but cannot be affected by secondary effects like Sleep, Disorient, or Fear.

name: Proximity_Mine
display_help: You explode, causing lethal and fire damage to nearby foes. Additionally, affected foes are knocked back and stunned.

name: Timer_Triggered
display_help: The mine is equipped with an automatic detonator that triggers after the mine has been present for a short while.

name: Proximity_Triggered
display_help: The mine is equipped with a proximity trigger that initiates detonation if an enemy target comes too close.

messages.display_victim_hit: You've triggered a proximity bomb!

name: Resistance
display_help: A proximity mine has been placed. It is strongly resistant to all forms of control and damage.
